documents.document:
It's getting better

Thing's around my World or getting a little bit better a little bit every day. .sound a bit dorky..but that's the way I choose to see all the stupid crap I've been going thru since January.2010.Becoming a 24/7..352 day's a year extreamly gulliable and sometime's fellinf shafted aint an easy thing to learn how to do at this ripe old age I've finaly reached.Heck..I thought my "Motherly"duties were behind me and it was my time to SHINE till it was my time to burn out.. .well I'm here to say..Ain't no such thing as done.. ..How the HELL did I get into this stuff anyway?? How can a woman birth babies and be a full fledge JUNKIE,,get busted for "Trafficking Drug's" 3 time's and still collect $$$ from the State of Missouri..OMG...Eveb after all kind's of FACTS and Information was turnd in and farified..she still get's away with EVERYTHING.. ..and here I sit with two little kid's at this stage of my life.I want a MAN!!! I'm not done with being a woman just yet.But what Man in his right mind want's a woman like ME.. ..I'm not dead yet.I still have a lot of good in me that hasn't been brought out yet.I'll survive.And these kid's will grow up with a LIFE..not an exsistance filled with drug's and booze..Not while I still have anything to say about it.So I guess I'll just have to work a little harder and find more time hidden someplace in 24 hours.Heck..I found time to hit these key's tonite.. ..so I think I'm a WINNER in this battle after all.Just not ready to give up on Love..I miss a miss a Man by my side.This game ain't over YET!!!

Stll LEARNING how to do this stuff

..hey friend's and other users..I'm still trying to learn this PAN thing.I just spent 10 min utes replying to a message and my Destiny snuck a little finger in and it went POOF.. ..I can't get it back.I don't know how.I don't even know if anybody reads any Blog stuff.I hope so.. ..I'll get better.BUT..Please..fofgive me if I don';t respond as fast as everybody else dose.I'm not playing games..I'm just STUPID at a lot of this computer stuff.SORRY..This is the exact reason I gave up on Yahoo messanger chatt thing..

Got ahead of me one more time..grrrrr

Holly shamooli.. My mail has gotten so far ahead of me again it's made me fell like a nuckel'butt.. It ain't the first time.Hope it's the last time tho.. ..I didn't join this site to find a date or any thing like that.I do LUV all the attention I get on here but being a liv'N'grandma make's it almost impossiable to keep up with my mail.If it wasn't for this site I wouldn't have an Adult to talk with al all.I do miss my husband still.He died so fast.Now I don't know if I'm suppose to be with another man or just sit and wish all the time.I get scared when it comes time to meet someone new.I was with the same man for 34 years.OMG..Am I good enough now?I am a lot older than I was at the start of my mating time..haha.NO MORE BABIES..Grandma and Grandpa is all.Is there a Man out there that's comfortable with just that? Am I supoose to just give up this Home and my familey and take his familey on??How dose a Lady merge into a new Life at this age and time?Am I wrong if I date a younger fellow?Should I just date in my age group?This is a realy scarey time for me. ..I have collected a few wrinkles.My bods not a "Kardashions" bod now.If there is somebody out ther that has some mind building instruction's or ideal's..PLEASE tell me. ..I get so many wonderful compliment's..How do I just relax and go with the flow now??Mabey I need to just STOP thinking and trying to figure all this sort of stuff out.Don't know..but.."it ain't over till the fat lady sing's".. .. I did learn a lot from the new Movie"Live,Love,Eat"..mabey I need to get my Pass'port updated..

Black listed ???

..I'm beginning to think one of the friend's I write to has a Lady that just BLACK LISTED me.. I'm not upset about it..BUT you guy's need to check your mail and see if your Lady has X'd me out..I'm not a danger to anybody.If your already with a Lady.. COOL..Your a Lucky dude. Stay with it and make it work if at all possiable.If not.. Celibrated and join the club.Whatever..check you X'd out stuff..tottles..

done got'er figured out

Whelp..I don'n got'er figured out just WHY I'm like I am. Thank GOD.Maybe if anybody reads this they will either relate of think I'm a nutt. Whatever,I'm feeling pretty good putting it on here to share and kind inform. .Read if you want.I guess I'm leaving myself in for critisiman,hope it isn't to much for me this time.OK..here I go.. I lived a long time with the same man.I shared everything with him.He knew who I was and why I'm the way I am.Every scar,wrinkle,"Love handle's"not so perky boobs,like they use to be when I was 25,long leg's that use to knock him out with the "wants",ouchies when I move a certain way due to carring babies in my tummy that came out weighing 12lbs.14oz.twice ,scare I try to hide in my hair due to a (benian) brain tumer that grew to the size of a large lemon,I received due to being kicked in the face with both back hoof's from a real BAD horse my Aunt Clara owned when I was just 15 yeas old and that took 21 operation's to repair before a normal person could look at me without screaming and getting sick,(oh yea,all this long black hair I grew was after they shaved me bald to operate on the toumer that took until I was 42 years old,and was told to "Make my Funeral arrangment's" because I wasn't expected to survive to surgery).. ..it took me a year to learn how to walk,talk,even feed myself, ..but I DID IT!!!.The man I lived with,shared a life with for so darn long knew all about EVERYTHING.I never had to worry about what he knew.He was with me when it happend to me.So..this is the reason I'm so scared of being with another man now.I'm a good looking Woman that Loves being a Woman.I'm not flawless in body or mind,So if your looking for perky boobs,knock'm dead leg's and a Tryathalon Athlete..i'm not it .. But if you can deal with all of ME..let me know..Thank's..

Good stuff

Thought It mite be a good thing if I counterd yesterday's info with some Good stuff. I'm a good woman.I had to learn how to do almost everything by myself after I became a Widow. even pump my own gas..My man took care of all those macho thing's,Anyway..I sucessfuly paid off my Home,bought a Cadilac Seville,used but georgous .the first time I drove it out on a Friday nite a number of guy's stopped by while I was sitting in it and told me .THAT felt so good.II take good care of myself.My skin is as soft as a baby's butt.My hair is long and REAL,I'm not FAT,I'm an AWSOME cook,mellow temper,never argue,it wouldn't make anything better,so why wast the energy,no ilegal drug's,not a drunk,hardley ever drink,no reason to,NO mental medication's EVER..vitamin's or my choice of drug..lol..I can take an emty box and make a sweet home out of nothing, pench a penny till it hollers,smart as whip,keep a soft,sweet smell'n bed,fanitic about my sheet count(thread wise).Great in home managment ideals and I can do almost anything it take's to fix'er'up.I'm just a GOOD Person all around.When I have a Man I truley Love and respect...OMG..he couldn't find a more Loving,kinder,gentler,sweeter,patient,respectful,understanding,better listiner,non smothering,non snooper in ur'mail'r'phone,away's on time,stick to the game plan's,give you some of your own space kind'a gal,don't cut you off from your already friend's.throw a temper NOT kind'a gal,that has never and will NEVER go thru my man's wallet..LADY.. .If you want perky boob's.Buy me some.If you want no wrinkles on my chin or smile line's around my eye's,buy me some.If you want to me to loose my LUV'handles .have them sucked out (by machine,silly butt)..I would LOVE to get that all done.But I'm the way I am. So there you have it all.Thank's for reading this,IF you did,,if not..oh well..I fell better anyway.

Sorry I've been gone so long..AGAIN..lol

Figured I'd better write and let you know why I've been gone for so long one more time..dahhhh.. This house is full of coughers..YEP..the cold I got first has spread thru EVERYBODY. Nites or long and far from silent.Cough,cough,cough..and it's from everybody but ME.. I'm down to a tickle..Needless to say you can see the time I'm writing this message..1:21 a.m...So bare with me.I'm the chief nurse and bottle washer now.Sitting down long enough to open this computer up ain't an easy task.I shall return.Don't give up and keep writing me messages.I get to read them .but to reply is a bit difficult with little Destiny or Cyle..or Brice sitting on my lap..I B'Back..nite nite..

Keeping up with the Times.

It been a while since I've been on this site.It's just been to darn busy around here latley.I'm finaly over my COLD.Just a tiny agrivating cough left at nite.Everybody else in this house has it now. I fell a bit guilty for being the first.I must have brought it into the house.Oh'well..such is Life and the beginning of Fall.The leaves or almost gone around town now.Lot's of high wind's these past few day's have striped them off.I've stayed busy making Halloween spooky thing's for the grandkid's.I do Love this time of year.I start baking a lot when it turn's cold.Bread pudding and pies or my favorite thing's.Cookies come next.The g'babies or starting to come ONLY to me(grandma) with all there bobo's..hahah.Kinda make's Mom and Dad a jelouis/ Cyle,my 5 year old Kindergarden boy,say's it's because I'm the oldest Momma in this house and I know everything about everything.. Make's me fell like a Queen when I'm felling tired and worn out.Wish I had a Man that lived closer.I would realy like to go out for an evening and just be a Woman and not think about anything but enjoying being a Woman with my own Man next to me holding me Why do all the gentelman I find interesting live so darn far away.. Mabey before I die I'll win the Lottery.Then I could just pack a little bag,fly,have fun,and fly back.I just can't move away and leave my grandkid's and be away from my Mother.I went to visit Mom this evening.She is so beautiful to me.I think about how I would fell if I was to move away and she died. I just can't.I never thought of what it would fell like when my Mom was moved to a Nursing Home because she was so old and couldn;t walk anymore.It's NOT a good feeling. I hope and pray I won't be left all alone and die alone in a place like she is in now.At lest all the familey goes over to visit her every week.My step'dad,Ted and sister Theresa goes every day now.I hope I have somebody that Loves me that much when I get that old.I do Love my Mom..well it's late.better close this down and crawel under my fuzzy blankie..Nite nite..

Moden CRASHED ast Wensday

Well everybody,my darn Moden blew out last Wensday and I called my provider,Century Link,it took them 4 hours to decide I was smart enought to figure out what was wrong and why I wasn't on line.I knew.I tried to tll them.. .So at 4:00 pm the orderd me a new Moden to be sent OVER'NITE.Well I wated till Saturday,called,was told my order never was even put in.. mush less sent.I orderd another Modem. waited,NOTHING called AGAIN today and the second Modem was no wear to be found.I ordered one more.Third one,to be sent over'nite.I'm now on dial'up till it arives.At this rate it may be a while till I get back to a some'what normal,dependable PC life.Tomorrow is my Birthday. I made it another year.cross your fingers UPS makes a stop at my house.It the ONLY Birthdat presant I want now.Except to be with my friend's and fell wanted and Loved. God pleae give me that..PLEASE...Love ya'all..more than U'can'e'magin..

Not gone or dead just yet.

I'm a slow poke I know.But Christmas and getting ready for Winter takes a toll on this gal.I'll have a few quiet moment's tomorrow.Love ya all.Nite nite..

I'm living in the "Twilite Zone"

This is the second time I've attempted to write this.it blank's out when I hit the wrong darn key.. anyway..My Mom is now under the care of Hospic..you all know what that means...waiting for the Grim reaper to com'a'knock'n at the door.I had to praticaly fist fight my own sister to get her moved back to Warrenton.Mom had another realy bad stroke.My sister Theresa moved in my Mom's house with my Mom's boyfriend and took over EVERYTHING..She is working her fanny off,,I don't care about any of that stuff..But my mom deserves to be Home like she wrote down and I entend to do all i can to keep her here.So if anybody think's I'm out running around having fun..YOUR WRONG..this ain't no fun..My own Home is turned into a CRAZY sanitarioum..it's too much to write on here I have to be careful or I'll end up paying for it,,More than just $$$$..it's gotten down to my health and well being.Got to go..

My Mom just passed away

My Mom jusy passed away 10 inutes ago.It's been a very long hard road to walk on.Please..give me time to get all this setled in my Heart.She was a GREAT Mom and I will miss her terriably..

So sorry I have failed to reply.

I now confess to being such a failure in Friendship. I do now have the means to make a better effort at answering my mail...It did end up costing me an extra,much un'wanted and not ecpected $99.99 to get this brand new Gateway Quad Core Laptop Computer fixed due to the strange "not coverd by manufactures warrenty".. ..BUT I bit the bullet and my wallet and had it repaired by remote..so now I can finaly sit and use it like I was told when I bought the darn thing...ANYWAY...Back to my confession... ...It's a faut I can't seem to Master.I once never let a single day go by without checking and replying to all my mail.Now it's become quite a chore to even find the time to sit down and open my PC up,much less read all my mail.I apoligize,sincerly I do.. ..Being able to manage this life style.. I had no intention of lasting this long... has been one heck of a challange..to say the lest.My nite'time computing hour has changed into a bed'time book reading nite time ritual to my grandchildren..Seem's there parent's can't find the energy to share this long time event with the three little one's they brought into the world... .hummm. .What's wrong with this picture,I asked myself..so I decided to try it myself... ...It has worked wonders... ..They now look forward to it everynite.So I have at lest used my nite time to a better advantage for the next up'n'coming generation.I hope you approve, and will forgive me for putting mail on the bottom of my DO'List.. [girly..]I'll try harder.. but I will NOT promiseI can't sleep at nite if I break too many promises.. ..Nitie nite my sweet friend.
